headline: Allstate Announces Preferred Dividends Payable Oct. 15, 2025
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., September 10, 2025--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) declared approximately $29.3 million in aggregate dividends on three series of preferred stock for the dividend period from July 15, 2025, through Oct. 14, 2025. All the preferred dividends are payable in cash on Oct. 15, 2025, to stockholders of record at the close of business on Sept. 30, 2025, as follows:

headline: Is Allstate Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: While Allstate has lagged behind the broader Nasdaq Composite over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Why This 1 Value Stock Could Be a Great Addition to Your Portfolio
